abstract: In recent weeks, money managers have been readily buying the new bonds of the region’s financial institutions, deals that just months ago would have seemed unlikely.
snippet: In recent weeks, money managers have been readily buying the new bonds of the region’s financial institutions, deals that just months ago would have seemed unlikely.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — European bank debt, once an investment pariah, is suddenly popular.

headline.main: In a Switch, Investors Are Buying European Bank Bonds
headline.print_headline: European Bank Debt Is, Surprisingly, Selling
